item.title: Mark Hamill Almost Retired From Acting Before ‘The Long Walk’: ‘I Said to My Agent, “I’m Not Motivated Anymore”’
item.description: The first 22 minutes of the Stephen King adaptation “The Long Walk” debuted at San Diego Comic-Con on Friday, following the debut of the new red-band trailer and a panel featuring the cast, including
